mapper.select: SELECT td_kspjong_basic.F15001 AS F15001 /* 현재가 */ , td_kspjong_basic.F15007 AS F15007 /* 기준가 */ , td_kspjong_basic.F15004 AS F15004 /* 등락률 */ , td_kspjong_basic.F15003 AS F15472 /* 대비 */ , td_kspjong_basic.F16013 AS F16013 /* 종목코드 */ , td_etfpdf_basic.F16583 AS F16583 /* 사무수탁회사번호 */ , td_kspjong_basic.F16013 AS F16013 /* 종목 단축코드 */ , td_etfpdf_basic.F16316 AS F16316 /* 구성종목코드 */ , td_etfpdf_basic.F33837 AS F33837 /* 구성종목수 */ , td_etfpdf_basic.F16499 AS F16499 /* 1CU단위증권수 */ , FORMAT( td_etfpdf_basic.F16499, 2) AS fmt_F16499 /* 1CU단위증권수 */ , td_etfpdf_basic.F33861 AS F33861 /* ETF시장구분 */ , td_etfpdf_basic.F34840 AS F34840 /* 액면금액설정현금액 */ , td_etfpdf_basic.F16588 AS F16588 /* 평가금액 */ , td_etfpdf_basic.F34743 AS F34743 /* ETF_PDF비중 */ , td_etfpdf_basic.F16004 AS F16004 /* 해외시장종목명 */ FROM td_etfpdf_basic LEFT OUTER JOIN td_kspjong_basic ON td_etfpdf_basic.F16316 = td_kspjong_basic.F16012 /* 국제표준코드 */ WHERE 1 = 1 AND td_etfpdf_basic.F16012 = #{F16012} /* 국제표준코드 */

SELECT td_etnpdf_basic.F16583 AS F16583 /* 사무수탁회사번호 */ , td_etnpdf_basic.F16013 AS F16013 /* ETF 단축코드 */ , td_etnpdf_basic.F16316 AS F16316 /* 구성종목코드 */ , td_etnpdf_basic.F33837 AS F33837 /* 구성종목수 */ , td_etnpdf_basic.F16541 AS F16004 /* 종목명 */ , '4' AS F33861 /* 시장구분 */ FROM td_etnpdf_basic WHERE 1 = 1 AND td_etnpdf_basic.F16012 = #{F16012} /* 국제표준코드 */
